phrases: The issue with Angelo's been resolved.
But I will not be coming back for a while.
That other photo we have been investigating...
Yeah, the one that the Speedwagon Foundation found in Egypt ten years ago.
I think I might finally know what it means.
I killed your grandpa, but you have no right to kill me!
If you kill me, you will end up a cursed soul, just like me!
Do not go telling people what they can and cannot do.
No one's going to execute you.
Not me, and not Jotaro, either.
You are not going to be executed,
and you are not going back to jail.
Josuke, I will leave the rest to you.
Wh-What do you plan to do with me, you bastards?!
For all of those you killed, including my Gramps!
Do not you dare get cocky!
I am sure he will kill you both for me.
The one wearing a school uniform,
Are you saying someone can willingly give another a Stand?
How is that supposed to scare us?
Angelo's not a Stand user by birth.
It was a mystery how he obtained his Stand powers.
But if there is actually a person who can give others Stands...
on a night about a month before my execution.
I could not sleep that night...
I was just staring blankly up at the ceiling of my cell.
It was a completely silent night.
I should have been the only one in that dark cell,
The guy in the school uniform.
How long have you been there?!
It was a very old bow and arrow.
It looked like it was centuries old.
I was so scared, I could almost feel my balls shriveling up.
But before I even had a chance to scream...
That means you have got the aptitude.
If you did not, you would be dead.
You have just obtained a talent.
It is more accurate to say it was pulled from your mind.
The worse the villain, the more they have...
This talent that the man named Dio called a Stand.
It looks like you were so busy
listening to my story that you forgot about my Aqua Necklace!
Hurry up and get me out of this rock!
I did not have enough rage in my heart for you.
Stop messing with your stupid hair!
I am going to kill this brat!
the guy in the school uniform will not let it slide!
He lives in this town, too!
I just did not have enough rage earlier.
I needed to do a great job of burying that asshole into the rock, like this.
I wanted to get a bit more out of him.
You actually believe the crap he was saying?
He is a man that the Joestar family has been fighting for over a hundred years.
My friends and I fought Dio and defeated him.
But there was one thing that I did not understand.
Back in 1987, why did the man called Dio suddenly acquire a Stand?
Could the same person have made him a Stand user?
The guy in the school uniform might be our new enemy.
Or perhaps it is the bow and arrow he had.
If that is somewhere in this city...
Then it is hard to believe that Angelo's the only danger here.
It is just like Jotaro said.
There is no doubt that the worst thing imaginable is hiding in this city.
An extremely terrible danger is coming to this city...
Since the beginning of this year, 1999, 81 people have disappeared in Morioh City.
Of that number, 45 of them were young boys and girls.
that is still seven to eight times greater than Japan's national average per city.
Koichi, you are even studying after school?
Josuke seems to be feeling better.
Hey, was this rock always here?
Yeah, but it did not look like this at first.
By the way, what happened to Jotaro?
Oh, he said he had something he wanted to look into.
He is staying at the Grand Hotel.
Does it have to do with this city?
No one's lived in this house for about three or four years, right?
It is so run-down that there is no way it would sell.
It should be torn down and rebuilt.
There was someone in the window just now.
My house is over there, right?
I would know right away if someone moved in.
to make sure homeless people do not crash there.
Now that you mention it, that is true.
I wonder if I actually saw a ghost...
H-Hey, do not say stuff like that.
And we are right in front of my house.
Stop gawking at my house, little brat.
What the hell do you think you are doing?
You two are in front of my house...
Morioh City Landmark 1 The Angelo Stone How to get there: A minute's walk from Morioh City Johzenji Street Bus Stop 3.
The Angelo Stone is known as a landmark, and a place where lovers meet.
It is admired by the people of the city, despite its creepy appearance.
If you are the newspaper guy, I already told you we do not want it.
My father just died of a stroke,
and we are still busy with everything that follows.
Could you come back another time?
I was waiting for you this whole time!
I have been so sad and lonely since my dad died.
I cannot believe you showed up at a time like this, Joseph!
I love you, I love you, I love you, I love you, I love you, I love you,
I love you, I love you, I love you, I love you, I love you, I love you!
I hate to disappoint you, but I am not Joseph Joestar.
Ask Josuke for the rest of the details.
I am here to see Josuke.
I am asking you where Josuke is.
Josuke has not come home from school... yet.
Then I will be back tonight.
If Joseph Joestar had come to this city,
he would have protected you as best he could from the dangers to come.
I cannot let him come here.
I am here in his place.
I just cannot feel at ease.
The bow and arrow that Angelo was talking about...
In documents the Speedwagon Foundation obtained regarding the witch, Enyaba...
She is holding the bow and arrow.
They give ordinary people the power of a Stand.
Do not go digging around here.
I am not talking about that.
I am telling you to let go of him, bastard.
If you do not let him go now, I am going to get pissed off.
Bastard is a bit much, are not it?
Calling someone you just met a bastard right in front of their house...
Do you even know how to talk to people?
Well, I know how to shut that mouth of yours.
Do you want to know why I shot him with the arrow?
Because that guy is Josuke Higashikata.
that means he is a Stand user who will be trouble for us, too.
I was hoping I could make him into a Stand user
that I could use like the others,
but I guess that is not happening.
I can still heal his wounds with my Shining Diamond!
I, Okuyasu Nijimura, will make you disappear
If you do not move, I am seriously going to mess up your face.
Using a Stand is the same as driving a car or riding a bike.
Dipshits with no skill or guts
will get scared and maneuver like crap,
no matter what kind of monster machine they ride.
Please do not say things that will piss me off too much.
This bastard's much faster than I thought.
We are not messing around here, Okuyasu!
The Stand that you acquired, The Hand, gives me chills just thinking about it.
You would better be serious when you use it.
Make sure you kill Josuke Higashikata, who defeated Angelo, no matter what!
He is bound to get in our way.
You are pretty stupid, are not you?
You are going to pay for that!
Get any closer and you will really piss me off!
Take your best shot, if you can!
He is got way too much confidence in his right hand.
I have got a really bad feeling about that right hand of his...
Let go of my right hand, you little shit!
Yeah, it is his right hand!
Do not you dare run away, Josuke!
Do not abandon your friend like that!
There is something up with that right hand of yours.
Something is telling me it is not safe.
Think about that after you are dead!
Just hang on a little longer...
You are getting farther away from your buddy.
I bet your Stand's right hand
It has the power to scrape away its surroundings.
Whatever this right hand grabs gets scraped away.
And the parts that do not get scraped away...
close together, so it looks like nothing changed.
As for the part that gets scraped away...
Even I do not know where it ends up!
I can do this to guys who try to run away, too.
I scrape away the space between us!
This is the power of the Stand even my bro fears, The Hand!
No matter where you go, you are...
You really beat Angelo like this?
I guess you just do not get that it is no use.
You are the one who is stupid!
You really are stupid, are not you?
That is a pretty great and terrifying Stand.
I will be in trouble if he wakes up and tries to attack.
I guess I should strangle him a bit, just to make sure he stays knocked out.
It will put the feeling of defeat in his soul, too.
It is the only one there is.
I just have to retrieve it.
it is this bow and arrow that unleashed Dio's Stand powers.
There is no doubt about it.
And after Enyaba died, someone obtained the bow and arrow,
and is creating more Stand users in Morioh City.
I have got to hurry and destroy that bow and arrow...
To make sure a villain more evil than Dio
does not appear with a Stand more powerful than The World.
Episode 4 The Niji mura Brothers, Part 2
